metadata.title: CVE-2025-0244 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: When redirecting to an invalid protocol scheme, an attacker could spoof theaddress bar.*Note: This issue only affected Android operating systems. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 134.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
